value.name: Longtime Baltimore police detective posts graphic photo of homicide victim on Twitter; department opens review
value.description: The Baltimore police department said Friday that it is reviewing whether a graphic photo of a homicide victim posted on social media overnight by a longtime and increasingly controversial homicide detective violated department policy.

value.name: Father charged with murder, child abuse in death of 2-month-old girl, Baltimore police say
value.description: A Baltimore man was arrested and charged with murder and child abuse in the death of a 2-month-old girl, Baltimore police said Tuesday. Darius Williams, 33, and the father of the baby, was charged with first-degree murder and second-degree child abuse after police said Zorii Pitts was found dead Saturday.

value.name: Baltimore police are investigating the killing of a 58-year-old man on Friday morning
value.description: Baltimore homicide detectives are investigating the killing of a man found unconscious in Northwest Baltimore Friday morning, police said. At approximately 10:25 a.m., Northwest District patrol officers responded to the 3800 block of Clarks Lane near the Fallstaff neighborhood for a report of an injured person.

value.name: State Roundup: Hogan signs bills repealing state song, legalizing sports betting among many others
value.description: Gov. Larry Hogan signed more than 220 bills passed by the General Assembly into law on Tuesday, including measures that repeal Maryland’s pro-Confederate state song, legalize sports betting, and extend the authorization for off-the-premises alcohol delivery for two years,

value.name: Three people injured in overnight shootings in Baltimore, police say; two arrested in earlier shooting
value.description: Two men and a woman were injured in separate shootings overnight in Baltimore, and a man and woman have been charged with shooting a man during a robbery earlier this month.

value.name: Man found fatally shot in Northwest Baltimore, police say
value.description: Baltimore police are investigating after a man was found dead from multiple gunshot wounds overnight, the department said on Wednesday. Northwest District patrol officers were patrolling the 5000 block of Palmar Ave. around 1 a.m. when a “concerned ...

value.name: Three people injured in overnight shootings in Baltimore, police said; two arrested in earlier shooting
value.description: Baltimore police are investigating unrelated shootings that left two men and one woman injured in the span of about six hours overnight, police said. Officers responded around 11:23 p.m. in the 3200 block of Belair Rd.
